response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. I understand that its true worth may be subjective and deeply personal to you, which is why I am offering it at a special price tailored to ensure both parties benefit. For this exclusive acquisition, I propose a price of $650,000. This offer reflects my commitment to finding the right owner who will appreciate and cherish the product as much as I have. I look forward to discussing the details and exploring how we might make this transaction beneficial for all involved.", "product_price": 650000}
